attributes.title: TERRIBLE
attributes.review: worst app ever created. horrible horrible HORRIBLE! the app cursed me and now oranges talk to me wherever i go. it’s like the bunker boy who’s in the office right now is trying to talk to me by using his fellow clones🍊🍊 i will never ever download this ever again. it took so long to download and it’s terrible.

attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.title: A disappointed Karen
attributes.review:
As a trump supporter I am very disappointed with this app our little timmy was in class when the app start black and I quote “my neck my back my p***** and my crack” worst app ever!! I’d like to speak to the manager of this app.

attributes.title: 🤮 worst app ever
attributes.review: This app almost took 10 days to download! While it was downloading I couldn’t access anything else on my phone. Once it was done it made the rest of my phone not work. 🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮 awful app.

attributes.title: DISGUSTING 😤
attributes.review: Took me like a month to download and when I opened the app it would show some crickets jumping. I didn’t make nooo sense. I deleted it and waiting a whole other month to get it again!!! This time there was whales 🐋🐋🐋🐋 it’s a scary app don’t get it ;))

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: Honestly this has to be the worst app I’ve ever used in my entire life, the quality and designs were mediocre, not even enough to catch my eye and make me think “trump 2020 🤪” do a better job next time ):

attributes.title: Absolute Trash
attributes.review: Between its radical racism and not even starting this app is just horrible!!! Even the app must be racist since it won’t allow a brown girl to open it. Garbage! Just like his election 🤦🏽‍♀️ what does it provide??? More ways to ruin our government 🥳🥳🥳

attributes.title: Terrible app
attributes.review: When I downloaded this app  I had  7 talking oranges attack me but I fought back and I ate them but they also said that to rate this app 5 stars but I didn’t  and  they self revived so I’m stuck in my house trying to fight them

attributes.title: MY WIFE LEFT ME
attributes.review: this app gave me extreme gas had nothing to do with the gas station shrimp i’ve had it a million times before with no consequence. as soon as i opened this app my rear let out a sound so loud my wife left me and took the kids. turkey club

attributes.title: Racist app
attributes.review: This was honestly the worst app ever it made my phone lag so much I had to delete the app. Also on the app there is a lot of racism and it’s offensive. This app should be deleted it’s honestly horrible. There is a lot of racism and it makes your phone lag. WORST APP EVER DOWNLOADED🥱
